attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax on company vans is to rise in April by more than six times the current rate.So instead of paying the current rate of around £2.50 per week it will rise to between £15 to £20 per week. Yet another grossly unfair stealth tax that punishes millions of ordinary hard working people who rely on driving company vans to earn a living. Please help and petition the Prime minister to rethink this scandalously unfair tax.
